sentences.cn: 是一种难燃的片状材料.

sentences.en: A nonflammable, sheet material. Fumes, if decomposed may irritate eyes, nose, and throat.
sentences.cn: 是一种难燃的片状材料.当分解时产生的气体会刺激眼睛 、 鼻和咽喉.

sentences.en: Although nonflammable, oxygen is a strong oxidizer.
sentences.cn: 尽管不可燃, 氧是一种强氧化剂.

sentences.en: Being both lighter than air and nonflammable, helium is used to inflate balloons and airships.
sentences.cn: 由于既比空气轻又不可燃, 氦用作充气球和飞艇.

sentences.en: Biological cleanser is made of natural plant extraction liquid, with alcohol-free, nonflammable, sterilizing and antistatic.
sentences.cn: 生物清洁剂为天然植物萃取液，不含酒精，不可燃，除细菌，并可抗静电；

sentences.en: Carbon dioxide is nonflammable, colorless, and odorless in the gaseous and liquid states.
sentences.cn: 在液态和气态时二氧化碳是不可燃、无色、无嗅的。

sentences.en: Dry - type transformers are completely nonflammable, using organic material such as epoxy resin.
sentences.cn: 干式变压器是完全不燃的, 采用如环氧树脂这样的有机材料.

sentences.en: For applications any liquid , even a nonflammable one , is objectionable, the dry type transformer is used.
sentences.cn: 在液体甚至是不可燃液体不允许使用的场所, 就采用干式变压器.

sentences.en: Gaseous argon is tasteless, colorless, odorless, non corrosive, and nonflammable. Argon belongs to the family of rare inert gases.
sentences.cn: 气态氩无味，无色，无嗅，无腐蚀性，不可燃。氩属于稀有惰性气体家族。

sentences.en: Gaseous helium is inert, colorless, odorless, non corrosive, and nonflammable.
sentences.cn: 气态氦极不活泼, 无色, 无嗅, 无腐蚀性, 不可燃.

sentences.en: Gaseous oxygen is colorless, odorless, tasteless, and nonflammable.
sentences.cn: 气态氧无色, 无嗅, 无味, 不可燃.

sentences.en: HIGHCLEAN is a nonflammable water-soluble cutting fluid of high performance and storage durability.
sentences.cn: HIGHCLEAN是高性能和存贮耐久性不易燃的溶于水乳化切削油。

sentences.en: Liquid nitrogen is inert, colorless, odorless, non corrosive, nonflammable and extremely cold.
sentences.cn: 液态氮是惰性的, 无色, 无嗅, 无腐蚀性, 不可燃,温度极低.

sentences.en: Nitrogen trifluoride ( NF 3 ) is a toxic, colorless, odorless, nonflammable, oxidizing compressed gas.
sentences.cn: 三氟化氮 ( NF3 ) 是有毒 、 无色 、 无嗅 、 不可燃的氧化性压缩气体.

sentences.en: Now, many wooden floors are nonflammable.
sentences.cn: 现在许多的木地板都具有阻燃这个功能.

sentences.en: Since nitrogen is nonflammable, special firefighting equipment and instructions are not needed.
sentences.cn: 由于氮不可燃，不需要特殊的救火设备和指导。

sentences.en: Synthetic solvents, the most common of which is Perchloroethylene ( PERC ) are nonflammable halogenated hydrocarbons.
sentences.cn: 合成溶剂, 最常见的是氯乙烯 ( perc ) 是不燃卤代烃.

sentences.en: The balance was carbonaceous fraction , the nonflammable inorganic fraction was negligible.
sentences.cn: 其余为不挥发的可燃物碳粒, 不可燃的无机物极少.

trans.tran_en: nonflammable materials or substances do not burn easily or do not burn at all
